Description: Initial setup of the Monorepo, Docker infrastructure, and DevOps pipelines based on NestJS Modular Monolith architecture.
Setup the main NestJS project and creating the 4 module folders (Auth, Catalog, Inventory, Orders). Verify tsconfig.json strict mode.
Create docker-compose.yml with PostgreSQL and PgAdmin. Ensure persistence volumes are configured.
Initialize Prisma Schema, configure datasource provider to PostgreSQL, and create the initial migration.
Configure .github/workflows/ci.yml to run Linting and Unit Tests on every push.
Handling User Registration, Secure Login (JWT), and Role-Based Access Control (RBAC).
As a new client, I want to create an account with a hashed password so that I can save my data securely.
Define User model in Prisma with email, passwordHash, and Role enum.
Implement AuthService.hashPassword() using bcrypt to salt and hash passwords.
As a user, I want to log in and receive a JWT so that I can access protected account features.
Implement Passport LocalStrategy for credential validation and JwtStrategy for token extraction. Configured Guards.
Public product browsing, searching, and filtering capabilities.
As a visitor, I want to view a paginated list of products to discover what is for sale.
As a visitor, I want to filter products by Category and Price Range to find specific items.
Create a seed script to populate the database with dummy products for testing.
Implement a custom Pipe or DTO transformation to handle `?page=1&limit=10` query params.
Implement Interceptor to cache GET /products responses for 60 seconds (Performance).
Managing physical stock counts and reservations.
As an admin, I want to manually adjust the stock of an SKU to correct discrepancies after a supply arrival.
As an admin, I want to see a list of items with low stock to reorder in time.
Implement `reserveStock(sku, qty)` method that atomically increments `reserved` count. Check `physical - reserved >= qty`.
The core transaction engine handling purchases and lifecycle.
As a client, I want to validate my cart and place an order, receiving a trusted total price.
Implement logic to fetch fresh prices from DB (not trust Frontend) and calculate Taxes.
Wrap `checkStock`, `reserveStock`, and `createOrder` inside `prisma.$transaction` for ACID compliance.
As a client, I want to see a list of my past orders and their status (Pending, Paid).
Migration from Modular Monolith to Distributed System using RabbitMQ.
Add RabbitMQ service to docker-compose and configure default exchange/queues.
Move Orders Module to a standalone NestJS app (`apps/orders`) with its own `main.ts`.
Move Inventory Module to a standalone NestJS app (`apps/inventory`).
Create `@app/shared` lib to hold `OrderCreatedEvent` DTO and share it between apps.
Replace direct service calls with `ClientProxy.emit('order.created')` in Orders and `@EventPattern` in Inventory.
